/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The road, divided by a median, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
